headline: Mackenzie Investments Announces Revised Final Year-End Reinvested Distributions for Four Exchange-Traded-Funds
summary: Mackenzie Investments ("Mackenzie") today announced revisions to the final year-end reinvested distributions of four Mackenzie exchange-traded-funds ("ETFs") that trade on the Toronto Stock Exchange ("TSX") and Cboe Canada ("Cboe") for the 2025 tax year. Please note that this is an update to the final year-end reinvested distribution previously announced on December 23, 2025.
